text: Peter Alan Wilkinson (1933-2014), was a male athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England and won a bronze medal in the marathon at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:English male marathon runners Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Peter Wilkinson (athlete)
